alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:06PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, Baker, Columbia, Suwannee, north central Duval, southeastern Hamilton, southwestern Camden, southeastern Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and central Charlton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 206 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Homeland to near Suwannee River State Park. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Live Oak, Jasper, Hilliard, Folkston, Callahan, White Springs, Fargo, Suwannee River State Park and Suwannee Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
